components.content:
In this section, we'll ask you to:

  • confirm you intend to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your needs
  • agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
  • confirm your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, supports this submission
  • commit to have proposals in place by March 2025 on how you will spend the funding
